description:
If you have a website using WordPress and you want to make it secured,so this course is designed for you.

This course will teach you how to secure WordPress in the professional way.You'll learn how to install and setup the most trusted and useful WP security plugin and how to do some of the important tricks so you'll be highly secured.

Through this course you'll learn how to install,activate and setup iThemes Security Plugin.

Also you'll discover the features that are available through this plugin,you'll learn how to do some tricks and some hidden options too.

In addition,I'll teach some tricks most of the Ethical Hackers do to make WordPress website more secured.

I'll keep this course up to date so you'll ensure that you'll have the newest informations and the tricks about security.
title: Secure Your WordPress Website(Using iThemes Security plugin)
